mapper.select: select no, head, subject, userid, hit, to_char(writedate, 'MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from freeBoard order by no desc
select no, head, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate from freeBoard where no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update freeBoard set hit=hit+1 where no=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into freeBoard(no, head, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate, ip) values(board_sq.nextval, #{head}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{userid}, 0, sysdate, #{ip})
mapper.delete: delete from freeBoard where no=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
mapper.update: update freeBoard set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no=#{no} and userid=#{userid}
